info.author: Remy Blank
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
sync2cd is an incremental archiving tool. It allows backing up complete
filesystem hierarchies to multiple backup media (e.g. CD-R). Files are archived
incrementally, i.e. only new or changed files are stored during an archive
operation.

All entity types are supported: directories, files, symlinks, named pipes,
sockets, block and character devices.
info.name: sync2cd
info.html_description:
sync2cd is an incremental archiving tool. It allows backing up complete filesystem hierarchies to multiple backup media (e.g. CD-R). Files are archived incrementally, i.e. only new or changed files are stored during an archive operation.

All entity types are supported: directories, files, symlinks, named pipes, sockets, block and character devices.
